<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Unlike AAAMDFlatWorkGroupSize, it&#39;s getting trickier here. Since the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculation of waves per EU involves flat work group size, we can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simply use an assumed flat work group size as a start point, because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// update of flat work group size is in an inverse direction of waves per</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EU. However, we can still do something if it is an entry function. Since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an entry function is a terminal node, and flat work group size either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from attribute or default will be used anyway, we can take that value and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calculate the waves per EU based on it. This result can&#39;t be updated by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// no means, but that could still allow us to propagate it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#a3c65c76a817d60e322ff750366674a92">AMDGPU::isEntryFunctionCC</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getCallingConv())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; FlatWorkGroupSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Attr = InfoCache.getFlatWorkGroupSizeAttr(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FlatWorkGroupSize = &#42;Attr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">        FlatWorkGroupSize = InfoCache.getDefaultFlatWorkGroupSize(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TakeRange(InfoCache.getEffectiveWavesPerEU(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, MaxWavesPerEURange,</span></CodeLine>
